phrs.translation: 爱的诡计, 详细翻译

sentences.sentence: Buyers use different ruses to wring free credit out of their suppliers.
sentences.translation: 买主们想方设法从他们那些供应商那里获取无息赊购。

sentences.sentence: But such ruses are not enough.
Li Dian warned, “I fear this is one of the ruses of Zhuge Liang.
sentences.translation: 李典曰："此恐是诸葛亮之诈谋，不可轻进。"
